name: Jeffdotzip And The Spoon Of Truth
name_original: Jeffdotzip And The Spoon Of Truth
description:
Welcome To Jeffdotzip And The Spoon Of Truth, A Big Project That Took About 6 Months.
This Game Was Built Entirely in RPG Maker MV, I Do Not Own Any Of The Music Shown Whatsoever.
I Want To Thank SMDude, Driftwood Gaming, TheUnproPro And Echo607 For Their Super Helpful Tutorials On YouTube!

This Was My First Ever RPG Maker Project, I Had Zero Knowledge Prior To Making This Game, Sorry If The Game Is Kinda Low Quality I Focused Mostly On The Story.

THIS GAME IS STILL IN BETA TESTING, IF YOU SEE ANY PROBLEMS PLEASE LET ME KNOW AT @jeffdotzip ON INSTAGRAM OR COMMENT BELOW!
